article_title: Obamacare Jobs Grow Faster In Medicaid Expansion States

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: States that agreed to expand coverage of Medicaid to more Americans under the Affordable Care Act have created more jobs than other areas of the country, according to a new report. Fitch Ratings said “healthcare and social assistance jobs grew over 30% faster between December 2013 and December 2014 for 24 [...]
